title: How to Configure Static IP Address on Ubuntu 18.04
content:
sudo nano /etc/netplan/01-netcfg.yaml

                                                                
network:
  version: 2
  renderer: networkd
  ethernets:
    enp0s3:
      dhcp4: no
      addresses:
         - 192.168.1.111/24
      gateway4: 192.168.1.1
      nameservers:
         addresses:  [1.1.1.1 , 8.8.8.8 , 8.8.4.4]


sudo netplan apply
